Tired of continuously using your mouse to scroll through websites? With Scroll Fast, you can now enjoy effortless scrolling without the constant need for manual control.

Here's how it works:

- Long press on any page until the Scroll Fast icon appears.
- Release the click and effortlessly move your mouse up or down to control the scroll speed.
- To stop auto-scrolling, simply click again â€“ it's that easy!

Visit our website for more information and take your browsing to the next level with Scroll Fast!
